channel.title: CVE Feed for Justice AV Solutions -- Viewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Justice AV Solutions -- Viewer

item.title: CVE-2024-4978|2024-05-29T17:11:59.027Z -- Justice AV Solutions -- Viewer
item.description: Justice AV Solutions Viewer Setup 8.3.7.250-1 contains a malicious binary when executed and is signed with an unexpected authenticode signature. A remote, privileged threat actor may exploit this vulnerability to execute of unauthorized PowerShell commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-4978|2024-05-24T13:42:18.766Z -- Justice AV Solutions -- Viewer
item.description: Justice AV Solutions Viewer Setup 8.3.7.250-1 contains a malicious binary when executed and is signed with an unexpected authenticode signature. A remote, privileged threat actor may exploit this vulnerability to execute of unauthorized PowerShell commands.
